title: GriefPrevention
description: The self-service anti-griefing Bukkit plugin for Minecraft servers since 2011.
body:

[![GitHub][github-shield]][github-url]

[![Patreon][patreon-shield]][patreon-url]
[![Downloads][downloads-shield]][bukkit-url]
![GriefPrevention Logo][gp-logo]
# The self-service anti-griefing plugin for Minecraft servers since 2011

</center>

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/hKrA6NXn7Sc" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>

## Platforms
#### Any stable CraftBukkit derivative ([Spigot][spigot-url], [Paper][paper-url], [Pufferfish][pufferfish-url], [Purpur][purpur-url], etc.)
GriefPrevention is targeted to support the latest available version of these platforms. Older versions can be found on our [BukkitDev][bukkit-url].

** _Note: Older versions are no longer updated and may not receive any support_


## Support
#### [Docs][docs-url] - Configuration, Commmands, Permissions, API, and more!
#### [Issue Tracker][issues-url] - Report any problems or bugs
#### [GitHub Discussions][discussions-url] - New ideas, Feature requests, and Other Discussions
#### [IRC Chat][irc-url] or [Discord][discord-url] - Talk and get help from community!


## Addons
#### Addons provide additional features to GriefPrevention. Some community made addons have been listed in our [GitHub Discussions][addons-url] addons section.
